text: [Music]
my name is anel Mario Castro Martinez I
have been working for DOA Telecom for
the last six years in different products
and services powered by
AI DOI Telecom is one of the world's
leading integrated telecommunications
company we have over 245 million mobile
customers 25 million fix line customers
and about 21 million Broadline
customers at do Telecom we receive
millions of requests from our customers
every year year and we created services
and digital agents to help alleviate the
load of those customers and those
requests in coming to our
hotlines we are building llm
applications to create a more natural
response for our customers and one of
the main challenges using generative AI
is to control the type of risky Behavior
hallucinations and as well as keeping
the cost down cuz this is a very
powerful technology and consumes a lot
of computational power so using the
latest generation of dedicated Hardware
from AWS we were able to achieve better
non-functional performance up until 25%
compared to our baselines while
providing the same type of functional
performance using inferentia 2 instances
we were able to achieve 25% relative
Improvement on the non-functional
requirements such as throughput latency
at a fraction of the cost we found that
the inferential two chips were on
average about 20% more cost efficient
than the G5 equivalent
instances AWS provid us with a scalable
robust and secure platform for
generative AI applications we started
with Amazon Bedrock to test the
proprietary and openly available models
then we follow up with certain
candidates using Amazon Sage maker jump
to have a bit more control over the
parameters and at the same time not
waste too much time in deployment and
maintenance thanks to the generative
capabilities the agents are now able to
retrieve information real time as
opposed to having to wait in several
interactions or or raising tickets and
then getting them answered by different
sectors so now we could consolidate all
the support at the same time means that
the customers are able to get faster
solutions to their
[Music]
problems
